creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panel huipil with randa; dense red and white stripe ground; upper half heavily brocaded with unidentifiable pattern - not quite geometric, possibly some zoomorphic references, but hard to decipher; patterns are weft face in yellow, green, purple, orange and red.
medium: Cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
